verses.verse: If <S%G1487><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> there is any <S%G5100><s%> encouragement <S%G3874><s%> in Christ, <S%G5547><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> there is any <S%G5100><s%> consolation <S%G3890><s%> of love, <S%G26><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> there is any <S%G5100><s%> fellowship <S%G2842><s%> of the Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> affection <S%G4698><s%> and compassion, <S%G3628><s%>

make <S%G4137><s%> my joy <S%G5479><s%> complete <S%G4137><s%> by being of the same <S%G846><s%> mind, <S%G5426><s%> maintaining <S%G2192><s%> the same <S%G846><s%> love, <S%G26><s%> united <S%G4861><s%> in spirit, <S%G4861><s%> intent <S%G5426><s%> on one <S%G1520><s%> purpose. <S%G5426><s%>

Do nothing <S%G3367><s%> from selfishness <S%G2052><s%> or <S%G3366><s%> empty <S%G2754><s%> conceit, <S%G2754><s%> but with humility <S%G5012><s%> of mind <S%G5012><s%> let each <S%G240><s%> of you regard <S%G2233><s%> one <S%G240><s%> another <S%G240><s%> as more <S%G5242><s%> important <S%G5242><s%> than himself; <S%G1438><s%>
do not [merely] look <S%G4648><s%> out for your own <S%G1438><s%> personal <S%G1538><s%> interests, but also <S%G2532><s%> for the interests of others. <S%G2087><s%>
Have <S%G5426><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> attitude <S%G5426><s%> in yourselves <S%G4771><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> was also <S%G2532><s%> in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%>

who, <S%G3739><s%> although He existed <S%G5225><s%> in the form <S%G3444><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> did not regard <S%G2233><s%> equality <S%G2470><s%> with God <S%G2316><s%> a thing <S%G725><s%> to be grasped, <S%G725><s%>

but emptied <S%G2758><s%> Himself, <S%G1438><s%> taking <S%G2983><s%> the form <S%G3444><s%> of a bond-servant, [and] being <S%G1096><s%> made <S%G1096><s%> in the likeness <S%G3667><s%> of men. <S%G444><s%>

And being found <S%G2147><s%> in appearance <S%G4976><s%> as a man, <S%G444><s%> He humbled <S%G5013><s%> Himself <S%G1438><s%> by becoming <S%G1096><s%> obedient <S%G5255><s%> to the point <S%G3360><s%> of death, <S%G2288><s%> even <S%G1161><s%> death <S%G2288><s%> on a cross. <S%G4716><s%>

Therefore <S%G1352><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> highly <S%G5251><s%> exalted <S%G5251><s%> Him, and bestowed <S%G5483><s%> on Him the name <S%G3686><s%> which is above <S%G5228><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> name, <S%G3686><s%>

that at the name <S%G3686><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> knee <S%G1119><s%> should bow, <S%G2578><s%> of those who are in heaven, <S%G2032><s%> and on earth, <S%G1919><s%> and under <S%G2709><s%> the earth, <S%G2709><s%>

and that every <S%G3956><s%> tongue <S%G1100><s%> should confess <S%G1843><s%> that Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> is Lord, <S%G2962><s%> to the glory <S%G1391><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> the Father. <S%G3962><s%>

So <S%G5620><s%> then, <S%G5620><s%> my beloved, <S%G27><s%> just <S%G2531><s%> as you have always <S%G3842><s%> obeyed, <S%G5219><s%> not as in my presence <S%G3952><s%> only, <S%G3440><s%> but now <S%G3568><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> more <S%G3123><s%> in my absence, <S%G666><s%> work <S%G2716><s%> out your salvation <S%G4991><s%> with fear <S%G5401><s%> and trembling; <S%G5156><s%>
for it is God <S%G2316><s%> who is at work <S%G1754><s%> in you, both <S%G2532><s%> to will <S%G2309><s%> and to work <S%G1754><s%> for [His] good <S%G2107><s%> pleasure. <S%G2107><s%>
Do <S%G4160><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things <S%G3956><s%> without <S%G5565><s%> grumbling <S%G1112><s%> or <S%G2532><s%> disputing; <S%G1261><s%>

that you may prove <S%G1096><s%> yourselves to be blameless <S%G273><s%> and innocent, <S%G185><s%> children <S%G5043><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> above <S%G299><s%> reproach <S%G299><s%> in the midst <S%G3319><s%> of a crooked <S%G4646><s%> and perverse <S%G1294><s%> generation, <S%G1074><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> you appear <S%G5316><s%> as lights <S%G5458><s%> in the world, <S%G2889><s%>

holding <S%G1907><s%> fast <S%G1907><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of life, <S%G2222><s%> so <S%G1519><s%> that in the day <S%G2250><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> I may have cause <S%G2745><s%> to glory <S%G2745><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> I did not run <S%G5143><s%> in vain <S%G2756><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> toil <S%G2872><s%> in vain. <S%G2756><s%>

But even <S%G2532><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> I am being poured <S%G4689><s%> out as a drink <S%G4689><s%> offering <S%G4689><s%> upon the sacrifice <S%G2378><s%> and service <S%G3009><s%> of your faith, <S%G4102><s%> I rejoice <S%G5463><s%> and share <S%G4796><s%> my joy <S%G4796><s%> with you all. <S%G3956><s%>
And you too, <S%G2532><s%> [I urge you,] rejoice <S%G5463><s%> in the same <S%G846><s%> way <S%G846><s%> and share <S%G4796><s%> your joy <S%G4796><s%> with me.

But I hope <S%G1679><s%> in the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> to send <S%G3992><s%> Timothy <S%G5095><s%> to you shortly, <S%G5030><s%> so <S%G2443><s%> that I also <S%G2532><s%> may be encouraged <S%G2174><s%> when I learn <S%G1097><s%> of your condition. <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4012><s%>

For I have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> one <S%G3762><s%> [else] of kindred <S%G2473><s%> spirit <S%G2473><s%> who <S%G3748><s%> will genuinely <S%G1104><s%> be concerned <S%G3309><s%> for your welfare. <S%G3588><s%>
For they all <S%G3956><s%> seek <S%G2212><s%> after <S%G2212><s%> their own <S%G1438><s%> interests, not those <S%G3588><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

But you know <S%G1097><s%> of his proven <S%G1382><s%> worth <S%G1382><s%> that he served <S%G1398><s%> with me in the furtherance of the gospel <S%G2098><s%> like <S%G5613><s%> a child <S%G5043><s%> [serving] his father. <S%G3962><s%>
Therefore <S%G3767><s%> I hope <S%G1679><s%> to send <S%G3992><s%> him immediately, <S%G1824><s%> as soon as I see <S%G872><s%> how <S%G872><s%> things <S%G3588><s%> [go] with me;
and I trust <S%G3982><s%> in the Lord <S%G2962><s%> that I myself <S%G846><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> shall be coming <S%G2064><s%> shortly. <S%G5030><s%>

But I thought <S%G2233><s%> it necessary <S%G316><s%> to send <S%G3992><s%> to you Epaphroditus, <S%G1891><s%> my brother <S%G80><s%> and fellow <S%G4904><s%> worker <S%G4904><s%> and fellow <S%G4961><s%> soldier, <S%G4961><s%> who is also <S%G1161><s%> your messenger <S%G652><s%> and minister <S%G3011><s%> to my need; <S%G5532><s%>
because <S%G1894><s%> he was longing <S%G1971><s%> for you all <S%G3956><s%> and was distressed <S%G85><s%> because <S%G1360><s%> you had heard <S%G191><s%> that he was sick. <S%G770><s%>

For indeed <S%G2532><s%> he was sick <S%G770><s%> to the point <S%G3897><s%> of death, <S%G2288><s%> but God <S%G2316><s%> had <S%G1653><s%> mercy <S%G1653><s%> on him, and not on him only <S%G3441><s%> but also <S%G2532><s%> on me, lest <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3361><s%> I should have <S%G2192><s%> sorrow <S%G3077><s%> upon sorrow. <S%G3077><s%>

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> I have sent <S%G3992><s%> him all <S%G4709><s%> the more <S%G4709><s%> eagerly <S%G4709><s%> in order <S%G2443><s%> that when you see <S%G3708><s%> him again <S%G3825><s%> you may rejoice <S%G5463><s%> and I may be less <S%G253><s%> concerned <S%G253><s%> [about you.]

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> receive <S%G4327><s%> him in the Lord <S%G2962><s%> with all <S%G3956><s%> joy, <S%G5479><s%> and hold <S%G2192><s%> men <S%G5108><s%> like <S%G5108><s%> him in high <S%G1784><s%> regard; <S%G1784><s%>

because <S%G3754><s%> he came <S%G1448><s%> close <S%G1448><s%> to death <S%G2288><s%> for the work <S%G2041><s%> of Christ, <S%G5547><s%> risking <S%G3850><s%> his life <S%G5590><s%> to complete <S%G378><s%> what <S%G5303><s%> was deficient <S%G5303><s%> in your service <S%G3009><s%> to me.
